analysis.description:
PlayInfinity.getPrize (/unique_chucks/13/0xe1c8414680e0f0ed3ce46b8db9ba93adf22ac9f1.sol#561-564) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- sender.transfer(value) (/unique_chucks/13/0xe1c8414680e0f0ed3ce46b8db9ba93adf22ac9f1.sol#564)

Reentrancy in PlayInfinity.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/13/0xe1c8414680e0f0ed3ce46b8db9ba93adf22ac9f1.sol#567-624):
	External calls:
	- tokens = calcNumberOfTokens(weiAmount) (/unique_chucks/13/0xe1c8414680e0f0ed3ce46b8db9ba93adf22ac9f1.sol#567-568)
	- availableTokens = getAvailableTokensAtCurrentPrice() (/unique_chucks/13/0xe1c8414680e0f0ed3ce46b8db9ba93adf22ac9f1.sol#568-569)
	- payReferralRewards(actualWeiAmount) (/unique_chucks/13/0xe1c8414680e0f0ed3ce46b8db9ba93adf22ac9f1.sol#590-601)
	- mapsStorage.setWinnerValue(sender,mapsStorage.winners(sender).add(sumOfSmallJackpot)) (/unique_chucks/13/0xe1c8414680e0f0ed3ce46b8db9ba93adf22ac9f1.sol#608-612)
	External calls sending eth:
	- payReferralRewards(actualWeiAmount) (/unique_chucks/13/0xe1c8414680e0f0ed3ce46b8db9ba93adf22ac9f1.sol#590-601)
	- payFee(fee) (/unique_chucks/13/0xe1c8414680e0f0ed3ce46b8db9ba93adf22ac9f1.sol#601-602)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- currentPrice (/unique_chucks/13/0xe1c8414680e0f0ed3ce46b8db9ba93adf22ac9f1.sol#614)
	- sumOfSmallJackpot (/unique_chucks/13/0xe1c8414680e0f0ed3ce46b8db9ba93adf22ac9f1.sol#613-614)
